sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-tooltip top color="error" transition="fade">
    <template #activator="{ on }">
      <v-icon color="error" style="cursor: pointer" v-on="on"> mdi-alert </v-icon>
    </template>
    <div class="py-2" v-html="errors.join(', ')" />
  </v-tooltip>
</template>
<script>
  import { VTooltip, VIcon } from 'vuetify/lib'

  export default {
    components: { VTooltip, VIcon },
    props: {
      errors: {
        type: Array,
        default() {
          return []
        },
      },
    },
  }
</script>
